title: Are female patients more likely to die if the surgeon is male?
description: In early January several newspapers ran article claiming that ‘women are 32% more likely to die after operation by male surgeon. If true, this is a terrifying figure but is all as it seems? We dig into the data to find out whether women should really be worried about having a male surgeon.
itunes:subtitle: Should women be worried about having a male surgeon?
